1.title: Highlands and Hummingbirds

episode of.title: Wild Colombia with Nigel Marven (TV Mini-Series 2012)

1.plot: A journey exploring Colombia's wild side, beginning in the capital Bogota, where Nigel encounters a blizzard of hummingbirds.

2.title: Lands of the Anaconda

episode of.title: Wild Colombia with Nigel Marven (TV Mini-Series 2012)

2.plot: The wildlife expert searches for anacondas, the biggest snakes in Colombia, in the flooded forests of the Amazon.

3.title: Creatures of the Caribbean

episode of.title: Wild Colombia with Nigel Marven (TV Mini-Series 2012)

3.plot: Nigel Marven visits Santa Maria, the world's tallest coastal mountain, which is home to many creatures found nowhere else on Earth.

4.title: Pacific Paradise

episode of.title: Wild Colombia with Nigel Marven (TV Mini-Series 2012)

4.plot: Nigel Marven explores Colombia's Pacific coast, which is home to giant geckos, glowing beetles and some bright and vividly coloured frogs.

imdb.plot outline: Colombia is a naturalist's paradise, with more vertebrate species than any other country on Earth, including over 160 species of hummingbird and more than 800 types of frog. From the Andes to the Amazon, the Pacific to the Caribbean, wildlife adventurer Nigel Marven journeys to the country's major habitats to meet rare and unusual creatures, many filmed for the very first time.
imdb.title: Wild Colombia with Nigel Marven
